subject: feat(query): fix collapse arrow spacing and add hop expansion
body:
Increase spacing between Clear button and collapse/expand chevron on the
mobile summary bar to prevent accidental taps. The chevron now has a
28px min tap zone with additional margin separating it from Clear.

Add hop expansion feature: after running a query pipeline, users can
select 1â€“3 hops to expand the visible graph to include connected
neighbors of the result nodes. BFS-style expansion in queryEngine
traverses the full graph's arcs. The "Show connected items" dropdown
appears below the last pipeline step. Cleared on query reset.
